full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'BUM BZANG GI LINGGA 'BUL TSUL GYI RIM PA RNAMS PHYOGS GCIG TU BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(DPAL RVA SGRIG GI GDAN PAR SNGA SOR NAS GAR MTSAMS YOD DUS CHA TSANG BA ZHIG MI 'DUG PA, DA LAM 'DI LA DOS NAS RGYU SBYAR TE 'PHYID DKAR GTZO BO 'KHOR BCAS DANG, DUR BDAG YAB YUM GYI 'TSAMS GAR 'JUG THOGS BSGRAL PA KYANG 'TSANG BA'I 'TSAMS YIG 'BUM BSANG GI LINGGA DGOS PHYAG MDZOD PA ZHABS DRUNG BSKAL BZANG RGYAL MTSAN NAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ZHVA SER BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED AA CHI THU NO MONG HANG BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS KYIS NGO CHA 'DI BZHIN DU SUG BRIS SU BGYIS SHING, DZA YANTU, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS,
